title: Eduardo Garcia Participated in a Drag Queen Pageant

description: Eduardo Garcia participated in a national Drag Queens beauty pageant in the Miss category representing the state of Coahuila. It was his first national pageant experience, and there were more than 30 participants from all over Mexico. He competed with four costumes. For the regional costume, he wore an outfit representing the traditional sarape of Saltillo, and for his gala costume, he used a Justia blue dress.
